Name: Preparation Room
WorldDescription: The preparation room assigned to elite squads. It has many built-in functions that are capable to tackle any emergency situation.

Name: Peaceful Courtyard
WorldDescription: A projected scene inspired by Kowloong courtyard. The falling leaves and air-conditioning system could bring Kowloong autumn to life in any season.

Name: Silver Light Church
WorldDescription: A projected scene inspired by the church in old times. The silver light of dawn shines through the windows. It is where the eternal oaths are made.
